103   private ZooKeeperWatcher getZooKeeperWatcher(HConnection c) throws
104     NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException {
105 
106     Method getterZK = c.getClass().getMethod("getKeepAliveZooKeeperWatcher");
107     getterZK.setAccessible(true);
108 
109     return (ZooKeeperWatcher) getterZK.invoke(c);
110   }

117   // fails frequently, disabled for now, see HBASE-6406
118   // @Test
119   public void testClientSessionExpired()
120   throws Exception {
121     LOG.info("testClientSessionExpired");
122     Configuration c = new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
123     new HTable(c, HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME).close();
124     HConnection connection = HConnectionManager.getConnection(c);
125     ZooKeeperWatcher connectionZK = connection.getZooKeeperWatcher();
126     TEST_UTIL.expireSession(connectionZK, false);
127 
128     // provoke session expiration by doing something with ZK
129     ZKUtil.dump(connectionZK);
130 
131     // Check that the old ZK connection is closed, means we did expire
132     System.err.println("ZooKeeper should have timed out");
133     LOG.info("state=" + connectionZK.getRecoverableZooKeeper().getState());
134     Assert.assertTrue(connectionZK.getRecoverableZooKeeper().getState().
135       equals(States.CLOSED));
136 
137     // Check that the client recovered
138     ZooKeeperWatcher newConnectionZK = connection.getZooKeeperWatcher();
139     States state = newConnectionZK.getRecoverableZooKeeper().getState();
140     LOG.info("state=" + state);
141     Assert.assertTrue(state.equals(States.CONNECTED) || state.equals(States.CONNECTING));
142   }

161   /**
162    * Make sure we can use the cluster
163    * @throws Exception
164    */
165   private void testSanity() throws Exception {
166     String tableName = "test"+System.currentTimeMillis();
167     HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration()));
168     testAdminSanity(admin, tableName);
169     HTable table = new HTable(new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration()), tableName);
170     testTableSanity(table, tableName);
171   }
172 
173   private void testSanity(HConnection conn, ExecutorService pool) throws Exception {
174     String tableName = "test"+System.currentTimeMillis();
175     HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(persistentConnection);
176     testAdminSanity(admin, tableName);
177     HTable table = new HTable(Bytes.toBytes(tableName), persistentConnection, pool);
178     testTableSanity(table, tableName);
179 
180   }
181   private void testAdminSanity(HBaseAdmin admin, String tableName) throws Exception {
182     HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
183     HColumnDescriptor family = new HColumnDescriptor("fam");
184     desc.addFamily(family);
185     LOG.info("Creating table " + tableName);
186     admin.createTable(desc);
187   }
188 
189   private void testTableSanity(HTable table, String tableName) throws Exception {
190     Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("testrow"));
191     put.add(Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("col"), Bytes.toBytes("testdata"));
192     LOG.info("Putting table " + tableName);
193     table.put(put);
194     table.close();
195   }

197   @Test
198   public void testMultipleZK() {
199     try {
200       HTable localMeta =
201         new HTable(new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration()), HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME);
202       Configuration otherConf = new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
203       otherConf.set(HConstants.ZOOKEEPER_QUORUM, "127.0.0.1");
204       HTable ipMeta = new HTable(otherConf, HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME);
205 
206       // dummy, just to open the connection
207       localMeta.exists(new Get(HConstants.LAST_ROW));
208       ipMeta.exists(new Get(HConstants.LAST_ROW));
209 
210       // make sure they aren't the same
211       assertFalse(HConnectionManager.getConnection(localMeta.getConfiguration()).getZooKeeperWatcher()
212           == HConnectionManager.getConnection(otherConf).getZooKeeperWatcher());
213       assertFalse(HConnectionManager.getConnection(localMeta.getConfiguration())
214           .getZooKeeperWatcher().getQuorum().equals(HConnectionManager
215               .getConnection(otherConf).getZooKeeperWatcher().getQuorum()));
216       localMeta.close();
217       ipMeta.close();
218     } catch (Exception e) {
219       e.printStackTrace();
220       fail();
221     }
222   }

224   /**
225    * Create a bunch of znodes in a hierarchy, try deleting one that has childs
226    * (it will fail), then delete it recursively, then delete the last znode
227    * @throws Exception
228    */
229   @Test
230   public void testZNodeDeletes() throws Exception {
231     ZooKeeperWatcher zkw = new ZooKeeperWatcher(
232       new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration()), 
233       TestZooKeeper.class.getName(), null);
234     ZKUtil.createWithParents(zkw, "/l1/l2/l3/l4");
235     try {
236       ZKUtil.deleteNode(zkw, "/l1/l2");
237       fail("We should not be able to delete if znode has childs");
238     } catch (KeeperException ex) {
239       assertNotNull(ZKUtil.getDataNoWatch(zkw, "/l1/l2/l3/l4", null));
240     }
241     ZKUtil.deleteNodeRecursively(zkw, "/l1/l2");
242     // make sure it really is deleted
243     assertNull(ZKUtil.getDataNoWatch(zkw, "/l1/l2/l3/l4", null));
244 
245     // do the same delete again and make sure it doesn't crash
246     ZKUtil.deleteNodeRecursively(zkw, "/l1/l2");
247 
248     ZKUtil.deleteNode(zkw, "/l1");
249     assertNull(ZKUtil.getDataNoWatch(zkw, "/l1/l2", null));
250   }

273   private void testKey(String ensemble, String port, String znode)
274       throws IOException {
275     Configuration conf = new Configuration();
276     String key = ensemble+":"+port+":"+znode;
277     String[] parts = ZKUtil.transformClusterKey(key);
278     assertEquals(ensemble, parts[0]);
279     assertEquals(port, parts[1]);
280     assertEquals(znode, parts[2]);
281     ZKUtil.applyClusterKeyToConf(conf, key);
282     assertEquals(parts[0], conf.get(HConstants.ZOOKEEPER_QUORUM));
283     assertEquals(parts[1], conf.get(HConstants.ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_PORT));
284     assertEquals(parts[2], conf.get(HConstants.ZOOKEEPER_ZNODE_PARENT));
285     String reconstructedKey = ZKUtil.getZooKeeperClusterKey(conf);
286     assertEquals(key, reconstructedKey);
287   }

289   /**
290    * A test for HBASE-3238
291    * @throws IOException A connection attempt to zk failed
292    * @throws InterruptedException One of the non ZKUtil actions was interrupted
293    * @throws KeeperException Any of the zookeeper connections had a
294    * KeeperException
295    */
296   @Test
297   public void testCreateSilentIsReallySilent() throws InterruptedException,
298       KeeperException, IOException {
299     Configuration c = TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration();
300 
301     String aclZnode = "/aclRoot";
302     String quorumServers = ZKConfig.getZKQuorumServersString(c);
303     int sessionTimeout = 5 * 1000; // 5 seconds
304     ZooKeeper zk = new ZooKeeper(quorumServers, sessionTimeout, EmptyWatcher.instance);
305     zk.addAuthInfo("digest", "hbase:rox".getBytes());
306 
307     // Assumes the  root of the ZooKeeper space is writable as it creates a node
308     // wherever the cluster home is defined.
309     ZooKeeperWatcher zk2 = new ZooKeeperWatcher(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(),
310       "testMasterAddressManagerFromZK", null);
311 
312     // I set this acl after the attempted creation of the cluster home node.
313     // Add retries in case of retryable zk exceptions.
314     while (true) {
315       try {
316         zk.setACL("/", ZooDefs.Ids.CREATOR_ALL_ACL, -1);
317         break;
318       } catch (KeeperException e) {
319         switch (e.code()) {
320           case CONNECTIONLOSS:
321           case SESSIONEXPIRED:
322           case OPERATIONTIMEOUT:
323             LOG.warn("Possibly transient ZooKeeper exception: " + e);
324             Threads.sleep(100);
325             break;
326          default:
327             throw e;
328         }
329       }
330     }
331 
332     while (true) {
333       try {
334         zk.create(aclZnode, null, ZooDefs.Ids.CREATOR_ALL_ACL, CreateMode.PERSISTENT);
335         break;
336       } catch (KeeperException e) {
337         switch (e.code()) {
338           case CONNECTIONLOSS:
339           case SESSIONEXPIRED:
340           case OPERATIONTIMEOUT:
341             LOG.warn("Possibly transient ZooKeeper exception: " + e);
342             Threads.sleep(100);
343             break;
344          default:
345             throw e;
346         }
347       }
348     }
349     zk.close();
350     ZKUtil.createAndFailSilent(zk2, aclZnode);
351  }

367    *  test differs from {@link #testMasterSessionExpired} because here

370   @Test(timeout=20000)
